
# Combination of the Modules {#sec-combination}

This chapter shows the possible combination of modules for different topologies. Each topology is linked to the wikipedia page or similar information source of the converter. @tbl-combinations can be read as follow:

- The modules for each converter are in correct order from left to right
- Each module has the designator of the connected solderbridges attached
- Abbreviations in the table:
    - $In$ = Input Module
    - $Sw$ = Switching Module
    - $P$ = Passive Module
    - $T$ = Transformer Module
- An Output Module is added at the end of each topology and is not listed in the table
